column4: I've got a question.  There's this old computer I've got and when you start it up the fans and lights come on but that's it.  It doesn't load the bios or anything.  I know the monitor and ram chips work but that's the extent of it.  Any ideas what the problem could be?
yeah, though off-topic...bad video card? try reseating the ram?
The graphics card is onboard and I reseated the ram.
maybe #hardware might be a channel to try..
